title: reNu Watch Face
summary: reNu your watch with many different combinations of watch faces
description: reNu Watch Face is a clean detailed watchface with bright color accents. The companion app inside android wear lets you customize your watchface. Many updates coming soon. This is just the beginning of BigDX watch faces!FEATURES:★ Superb readability★ Battery and Date indicator ★ Dark and Light themes★ Blue, Red and Green color options★ Tick and sweep second hand★ Toggle battery and date widgets visibility ★ Ambient mode★ Live preview of settings on phone★ All settings can be changed on watchSupport for square (G Watch, Gear Live, ZenWatch etc.) and round (Moto 360, G Watch R etc.) displays.INSTALL NOTES:After installing the application, new styles of watches appear in the menu selection of watch faces in your Android Wear after 10-20 seconds. If you encounter problems with the installation of watch faces on Wear, please go to the android wear app -> Settings and "Resync apps".
descriptionHTML:
reNu Watch Face is a clean detailed watchface with bright color accents. The companion app inside android wear lets you customize your watchface. Many updates coming soon. This is just the beginning of BigDX watch faces!

FEATURES:
★ Superb readability
★ Battery and Date indicator
★ Dark and Light themes
★ Blue, Red and Green color options
★ Tick and sweep second hand
★ Toggle battery and date widgets visibility
★ Ambient mode
★ Live preview of settings on phone
★ All settings can be changed on watch

Support for square (G Watch, Gear Live, ZenWatch etc.) and round (Moto 360, G Watch R etc.) displays.

INSTALL NOTES:
After installing the application, new styles of watches appear in the menu selection of watch faces in your Android Wear after 10-20 seconds. If you encounter problems with the installation of watch faces on Wear, please go to the android wear app -> Settings and "Resync apps".
comments: Pretty good I just wish I had a square watch face
won't appear on Watch no matter how many re boots. or synch. doesn't work.
Awesome! You conquered the mobile themes, glad to see ya working on watch faces now too.
recentChanges: Added new live preview in watch settings on phone (See all changes made to watch instantly)
Added option to switch location of battery and date
Made all settings for watch style available on watch (when selecting reNu watchface click gear icon under preview)
**If you have any issues please uninstall, reboot and reinstall. Had to make many behind the scene changes that might require this. I apologize this is needed.
